string.name: textured

A textured A-line dress featuring a mock neck, box pleats, a concealed back zipper, and a dotted crochet panel along the hem.
Sleeveless Partially lined, knit 94% polyester, 6% spandex; Lining: polyester Hand wash cold Made in USA FIT DETAILS:
Made from Small 30" full length, 30" chest, 26" waist
